title: Cant purchase anything from the store even after a Repair.
body:
Hi guys I've been trying to buy the URF summoner icons for the past few days and it simply wont let me. I click on the buy button but the screen that ends up usually following asking you to confirm does not appear.
Just curious if this is a known bug that other people are having or if im the only one and how i can go about fixing it?

replies.body: Honestly bruz, contact Riot Support. They'll get back to you within the day, they're super quick in getting a response. Let us know what the fix was and try hope others out :D.

>They'll get back to you within the day, they're super quick in getting a Copy paste response. 

FTFY
